boardgame.name: Vegas Showdown
boardgame.description: Players compete to build the most famous hotel/casino. Room tiles representing slot machines, lounges, restaurants, and other casino-related places appear on a central board and the players hold auctions to win the rights to have those rooms in their building, garnering them income, population, or fame. Bidding wars escalate, values fluctuate, and designers renovate until finally the hotel/casinos are put to the test to determine whose garners the most fame._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamehonor: 2006 Golden Geek Best Family Board Game Nominee
2007 Games Magazine Game of the Year Winner
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: BGTG 51 - Feb.13, 2006 - SR: Jenseits von Theben, Vegas Showdown, Bolide, Zahltag, and Feedback
Episode 33: Coimbra, Roll Player Expansion, Kaiser_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Pirates, Vegas Showdown
Episode 8: Super Dungeon Explore: Forgotten King, Timecop, and Battleheart: Legacy
The Good, The Board and Political: Episode 60 “Politics in Games”
boardgame.boardgameaccessory: Vegas Showdown: Nevada City Casino Clash playmat

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

Brand new and factory sealed! Gamers_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; Inn is a real store in Mesa AZ, and will ship via DHL Ground or the USPS. Most games will ship for $7.50 unless it is particularly light or heavy, or if you request Priority or special handling. Insurance is available on all orders for about $2. All games can ship international, and we will quote costs upon request. Delivery confirmation goes with every order. We do our best to give an accurate description of condition, and will ship them safely and quickly, and we will gladly combine shipping costs. In store pickup _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; payment is available with no shipping or handling charges. Arizona residents must pay 7.5% sales tax. About us: We can be reached at: info@gamersinnaz.com The store is open 24/7/365 and can be phoned at: 480-507-0509 Street address: 1232 E Southern Ave, Mesa, AZ 85204 You can check out our history as a Power Seller on eBay at: http://myworld.ebay.com/gamers_inn or on Amazon: http://www.amazon.com/gp/shops/index.html/104-7806078-3093525?ie=UTF8_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;sellerID=A2M6J42JR1XQD Our home page: http://www.gamersinnaz.com

Opened, but never played. I can only accept check, money order, or Paypal (if it is funded through a bank account, not a debit or credit card).

Avalon Hill (WOC 954420000) Build the Hottest Casino on the Strip! You and a few of your millionaire friends have invested in a plot of land in the heart of Las Vegas. Each of you has one year to plan and build a luxury hotel/casino on the site. Just to make things interesting, you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve put a little wager on your venture -- when the doors open, the builder of the most famous hotel/casino wins ownership of the entire block! Resources are limited, so you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll have to outbid each other to get the best contractors to work on your project. With the right combination of restaurants, lounges, gaming rooms, and other attractions -- along with some well-timed publicity -- the jewel of the Entertainment Capital of the World will be yours! Vegas Showdown contains: 1 Game Board 1 Rule Book 5 Hotel-Casino Layout Sheets 2 Building Prerequisite Charts 63 Feature Tiles -- 17 Large Tiles 20 Medium Tiles 26 Small Tiles 33 Event Cards 80 Money Chips 1 Turn Order Button 30 Markers -- 5 Fame Markers 5 Population Markers 5 Revenue Markers 5 Bid Markers 4 Minimum Bid Markers 6 No-Bid Markers

Players compete to build the most famous hotel/casino. Room tiles representing slot machines, lounges, restaurants, and other casino-related places appear on a central board and the players hold auctions to win the rights to have those rooms in their building, garnering them income, population, or fame. Bidding wars escalate, values fluctuate, and designers renovate until finally the hotel/casinos are put to the test to determine whose garners the most fame. lightly used copy in great shape. ($13 shipping)

Bought new, played twice, put away. Can provide photos of my copy on request. Can ship in the UK quickly. Can ship to the USA/Canada. Other places will need research. Happy to receive Paypal in GBP, USD, JPY, EUR. If you make the Paypal payment as a cash gift to me, I am not charged a fee as you receive no protection in a dispute. If you make the Paypal payment as a commercial transaction, I get charged 3.4% + 20p of the payment because you get protection in a dispute. Previously I was asking buyers to pay the fee but now I realise there is no option to do this (there was years ago). And if you add something to the payment to cover the fee, they get a slice of that. It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s your choice. If you want the Paypal protection, please go ahead and select the commercial button. If you want to add 1% or 2% to the payment, that_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s nice and I thank you. If you want to take a chance on me and make it a gift, thank you. You don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t know me from a hole in the ground. If you want cover, that_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s fine.
